title: Solarwind Prediction
description: Develop a solar wind forecasting system leveraging machine learning to predict solar wind parameters, enhancing space weather prediction capabilities for satellite communications and space mission planning.

title: House price Prediction
description: Develop a machine learning model to accurately predict housing prices in Boston using historical property data, enabling informed decision-making for homebuyers and real estate investors.

title: Pincode Serviceability Verification Web Application
description: The Pincode Serviceability Verification Web Application optimizes memory usage and accelerates data processing speed using sparse matrix techniques, providing a seamless solution for businesses to verify serviceability across diverse locations.
